system.description: You can move, fire a ranged weapon, and move again before your foes can react.
system.prerequisites: Dex 13, Dodge, Mobility, Point Blank Shot, base attack bonus +4
system.benefit: As a full-round action, you can move up to your speed and make a single ranged attack at any point during your movement. You must move at least 10 feet before and after your shot. You may not take a 5-foot step before, during, or after this action.
system.special: A fighter may select Shot on the Run as one of his fighter bonus feats.
